text:
Shashi Tharoor said cyberspace was a haven for those who spread terror. “At this moment in Geneva, leaders are trying to find a solution to the Syrian crisis. They will not succeed. The war will not end this weekend.” He said those responsible for the terror in Syria use technology to recruit supporters and spread their message. Yet, increased surveillance should not come at the cost of violating human rights. Paraphrasing a famous quote, Mr. Tharoor said, “Those who give up security for liberty end up losing both.”

Mr. Tharoor had an interactive session with students on ‘The Law and the idea of India’ in the morning.
title: Syria and the cyber war
